mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBCSMPLCODEC WHERE COALESCE(SMPL_LCCD,'-') = COALESCE(#{smplLccd ,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'-') AND COALESCE(SMPL_MCCD,'-') = COALESCE(#{smplMccd ,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'-') AND COALESCE(SMPL_SCCD,'-') = COALESCE(#{smplSccd ,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'-')
DELETE FROM TBCCOEXCODEC WHERE COALESCE(COEX_DTL_CD,'-') = COALESCE(#{coexDtlCd ,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'-') AND COALESCE(COEX_UPRN_CD,'-') = COALESCE(#{coexUprnCd ,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'-')
